Package model

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
model.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece extends Object
Class to manage all the piece of the game
Author:
Hitsuji

  • Constructor Details

    • Piece

      public Piece(Chessboard board, Position pos, String name, ColorG color, char symbol, Player player, int value)
      Constructor for the Class
      Parameters:
      board - The board of the game
      pos - The position of the piece on the board
      name - The color of the piece (BLACK or WHITE)
      color - The name of the piece
      symbol - The symbol of the piece
      player - Player who the piece belongs to
      value - The value of the piece

      Get the symbol of the piece
      Returns:

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Get the player who owns the piece
      Returns:
      A player of the game

    • isBlack

      public boolean isBlack()
      Check if the piece is black
      Returns:
      true if the piece is black, if white returns false

    • isWhite

      public boolean isWhite()
      Check if the piece is white
      Returns:
      true if the piece is white, if black returns false

    • getValue

      public int getValue()
      Get the number of points that values the piece
      Returns:
      Value of the piece

    • initialOfPiece

      public char initialOfPiece(int xPos)
      Get the initial corresponding for the piece
      Parameters:
      xPos - the ancient position in x of the piece
      Returns:
      'K' for King / 'Q' for Queen / 'N' for Knight / 'B' for Bishop / 'R' for Rook

    • canMoveTo

      public boolean canMoveTo(Position pos)
      Check if the piece can move to the position on the board
      Parameters:
      pos - The position to reach
      Returns:
      True if it can reach, else false

    • moveTo

      public Piece moveTo(Position pos)
      Move the piece
      Parameters:
      pos - The position where the piece goes to
      Returns:
      The old piece if eaten (else null)

      pos - The new position

      Check if the move is valid for the piece
